83ae8fa9-d394-4adf-969f-e311572ec06b.description: This training covers the basics of site reliability engineering (SRE), an emerging paradigm in DevOps. The training topics include functions and key tenets of SRE, as well as SRE principles such as service level objectives (SLOs), service level indicators, and how to identify and eliminate toil. The training consists of hands-on lab activities where participants will practice functions of SRE.
83ae8fa9-d394-4adf-969f-e311572ec06b.name: SITE RELIABILITY ENGINEERING (SRE)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Wiley Edge Global Academy SRE course.

3ef4a081-a061-41da-9034-b0b99bd3ac72.description: This course introduces learners to the world of financial markets, financial services, and the trade lifecycle. Participants learn fundamental principles related to banking and production support, including an overview of financial concepts, ITIL, monitoring, DevOps, and disaster recovery. They enhance professional skills including communicating with others, work from home considerations, and working with a remote team
3ef4a081-a061-41da-9034-b0b99bd3ac72.name: BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Wiley Edge Global Academy Banking and Financial Services course.

992866ee-2e8e-4030-9885-a246fb5ea19c.description: The course covers basic concepts and terminology related to finance and financial markets. The course is geared toward technology support specialists who must understand how international financial laws and practices can affect their work in a bank environment.
992866ee-2e8e-4030-9885-a246fb5ea19c.name: FINANCIAL FOUNDATIONS

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Wiley Edge Global Academy Financial Fundamentals course.

c42d7426-32b7-4a77-a30b-c575dfaf0595.description: After completing this course, learners will be able to explain concepts related to production support in a banking environment, including ITIL, monitoring, DevOps, SRE, and disaster recovery. Participants use Linux to manage a system, including file management, managing resources, and writing automated scripts, and use SQL to retrieve and manage data stored in a relational database.
c42d7426-32b7-4a77-a30b-c575dfaf0595.name: PRODUCTION SUPPORT

badge_template_activities.title: Awarded after Production Support training.

c20aa38c-7aa1-4d6d-8c79-a1a0a0c1159a.description: This module teaches the fundamentals of developing a full-stack web application. On the back-end, participants learn to combine existing object-oriented programming principles with database persistence using MySQL, including schema design, CRUD SQL statements, and transactions. In the front-end, participants learn to use Spring Boot, and RESTful services to deliver web pages and data, as well as the use of jQuery to make those pages responsive.
c20aa38c-7aa1-4d6d-8c79-a1a0a0c1159a.name: JAVA FULL-STACK WITH SPRING BOOT AND REST API

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Wiley Edge Global Academy Java Full-Stack With Spring Boot and REST API course.

alignments.name: Wiley Edge Global Academy
alignments.description: The Wiley Edge Global Academy provides innovative, industry-relevant learning, preparing alumni for continued career success. We are the pre-eminent thought leaders for preparing diverse and emerging talent with specific industry competencies.

badge_template_activities.title: The Wiley Edge Alumni Program for Software Developers is a rigorous 10 weeks training program. The Alumni are selected from a talent pool of over 30,000 candidates based on a 4 step selection process. Post selection, the Alumni undergo full-time training in various aspects of full-stack software development, problem-solving, and creative thinking. The Alumni undergo continuous evaluation and are required to clear a final assessment to be deployed in a top global organization.

This training is based on “AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Study Guide: CLF‐C01 Exam”, authored by B. Piper, D. Clinton, 2018, DOI 10.1002/978111957440.

4d569fc6-f383-40de-a8a6-41fd4039e293.description: This training provides an in-depth look at concepts and tools related to DevOps Engineering. Learners gain an overview of DevOps tools, including Ansible, Puppet, Chef, and Docker. Learners examine CD/CI using Jenkins and version control. Includes Lean and Agile approaches, along with DevOps foundational topics of monitoring, observability, and site reliability engineering. The training includes an introduction to Graphite and Grafana, along with cloud native systems using Kubernetes.
4d569fc6-f383-40de-a8a6-41fd4039e293.name: DEVOPS

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Wiley Edge Global Academy DevOps course.

Participants will gain insight into the importance of cybersecurity and the threats organizations face in a changing global environment. Content includes an overview of best practices in: Cyber Risk Management, Cloud Security, Enterprise Security, and Application Development Security, legislation, incident response, and emerging technologies.
15a1641d-a9d0-4732-8ceb-005c7504a22c.name: CYBERSECURITY FUNDAMENTALS

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Wiley Edge Global Academy Cybersecurity Fundamentals course.

1d0a19e7-ccf4-4cff-9710-e65d7f2be21d.description: Participants in this program learn tools and concepts needed to build software applications using the programming language Go. The training includes functions, data structures, error handling, Goroutines and channels, testing, and networking. This training also includes an overview of containerized technology, Kubernetes, and how developers can use that technology to deploy, manage, and scale a Go app. Participants use Go to create APIs that can communicate with Apache Kafka
1d0a19e7-ccf4-4cff-9710-e65d7f2be21d.name: PROGRAMMING IN GO

This course is designed to level up the learner’s programming skills using functional and object-oriented programming. badge_template_activities.title: The Wiley Edge Alumni Program for Service Desk is a 10-week training program. Post-selection, the Alumni undergo 10 weeks of full-time training in various aspects of Service Desk, problem-solving, and creative thinking. The Alumni undergo continuous evaluation and are required to clear a final assessment to be deployed in a top global organization.

Learners will build on those skills to create modern web applications using Node.js, React, and GraphQL. It also includes a module on MongoDB to introduce participants to concepts related to NoSQL databases. Participants also use the following tools: Git, GitHub, REST, and One App.

67f2a161-428e-4a57-b1c5-b2abc0848349.description: This module provides learners mastery in the following database and SQL concepts: relational databases; database management system (DBMS); database tables, relations, columns, attributes, rows, records, tuples, and data types; primary, composite, natural, foreign, and surrogate keys; bridge table; and use of professional conventions when naming database tables and columns.

44af05bc-96de-4bff-8018-a0e0baafca18.description: This badge is awarded for the completion of EACH RECOMMENDED course in Level 1 of the Learning Journey. Level 1 contains basic level, mandatory and recommended technical, and soft skills learning in each pathway.
44af05bc-96de-4bff-8018-a0e0baafca18.name: The Learning Journey - Recommended Learning - Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of ONE LEVEL 1 (basic) recommended course within the Wiley Edge Learning Journey.

5f9f56e7-0f28-45d2-a034-1de6dc58d1d8.description: This badge is awarded for the completion of EACH RECOMMENDED course in Level 2 of the Learning Journey. Level 2 contains Intermediate level, mandatory and recommended technical, and soft skills learning in each pathway.
5f9f56e7-0f28-45d2-a034-1de6dc58d1d8.name: The Learning Journey - Recommended Learning - Level 2

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of ONE LEVEL 2 (Intermediate) recommended course within the Wiley Edge Learning Journey.
